Author: rwalling
Title: Why Good Developers are Promoted into Unhappiness

Author: brlewis
Content: I'd like to know more about their "don't advertise" strategy.  Do upscale shoppers talk to their friends about the deal they got on Heinz ketchup?

Author: brlewis
Content: I think sometimes this creative process of reversing conventional wisdom can lead to useful ideas.  More often the way people hit upon such ideas is when the conventional wisdom isn't working for them personally.
